title.text: Accessing GermaNet Data and Computing Semantic Relatedness

entities.text: Accessing GermaNet Data and Computing Semantic Relatedness

abstractContent.text: We present an API developed to access GermaNet, a lexical semantic database for German represented in XML.
The API provides a set of software functions for parsing and retrieving information from GermaNet.

entities.text: parsing and retrieving information from GermaNet

abstractContent.text: Then, we present a case study which builds upon the GermaNet API and implements an application for computing semantic relatedness according to five different metrics.
The package can, again, serve as a software library to be deployed in natural language processing applications.
A graphical user interface allows to interactively experiment with the system.
